item.title: 交易日 华尔街涨跌不一，停摆（几乎）被否决
item.description: 由于投资者为美国政府结束停摆做好准备，周三美国科技股再度跌宕起伏，但道指却攀升至新高，而油价则因有报道称原油供应量将高于此前预期而下滑。【原文：U.S. tech shares stumbled again but the Dow climbed to a new high on Wednesday as investors geared up for an end to the U.S. government shutdown, while oil prices slumped on reports that crude supply will be higher than previously thought.】

item.title: 美国众议院报告指责中国干预矿产市场
item.description: 美国众议院一个委员会周三表示，中国数十年来一直试图操纵全球重要矿产的价格，将其控制权作为扩大其制造业和地缘政治影响力的经济武器。【原文：China for decades has sought to manipulate global critical minerals prices, using its control as an economic weapon to expand its manufacturing sector and its geopolitical influence, a U.S. House of Representatives committee said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Shah Capital 促成 Novavax 出售，警告代理权争夺战
item.description: Novavax 公司的第二大股东 Shah Capital 正在敦促这家生物技术公司的董事会进行战略调整，包括潜在的出售，并警告说如果在未来四个月内没有任何进展，它可能会发起代理权争夺战。【原文：Shah Capital, Novavax's second-largest shareholder, is pressing the biotech's board to pursue strategic changes, including a potential sale, and warned it could launch a proxy fight if no progress is made in the next four months.】

item.title: 西南航空乐观预计 FAA 将在停摆结束后数日内允许全面排班
item.description: 西南航空公司（Southwest Airlines）周三告诉员工，该公司对美国联邦航空管理局（Federal Aviation Administration）将很快允许美国航空公司恢复全部航班计划表示乐观。【原文：Southwest Airlines told employees Wednesday it is optimistic the Federal Aviation Administration will soon allow U.S. airlines to resume its full schedule.】

item.title: 金丝雀资本申请首只 MOG ETF，推动纪念币发展
item.description: 金丝雀资本公司（Canary Capital）周三向监管机构提交了申请，准备推出一款追踪MOG币价格的交易所交易基金，这标志着在货币管理公司利用加密货币ETF的受欢迎程度之际，MOG币首次获得了监管机构的批准。【原文：Canary Capital filed for regulatory approval on Wednesday to launch an exchange-traded fund that would track the price of the MOG coin, marking a first for the meme coin as money managers tap into the popularity of crypto ETFs.】

item.title: FanDuel 所有者下调盈利预期，将于下月推出活动合约
item.description: 本周三，全球最大的在线博彩公司 Flutter 大幅下调了全年利润增长预期，主要原因是赌客们的又一次长期连胜增加了公司的赔付率。【原文：Flutter , the world's largest online betting company, sharply cut its full-year profit growth forecast on Wednesday, primarily due to another long winning streak by gamblers that increased its payouts.】

item.title: 人工智能热潮刺激网络设备需求，思科上调年度预期
item.description: 思科系统公司（Cisco Systems）周三上调了全年利润和收入预期，寄希望于数十亿美元的数据中心扩建能拉动对其网络设备的需求。【原文：Cisco Systems raised its forecast for full-year profit and revenue on Wednesday, banking on multi-billion-dollar data center expansions to drive demand for its networking equipment.】

item.title: 美联储主席柯林斯称维持政策利率不变 "可能是合适的
item.description: 波士顿联储主席苏珊-柯林斯（Susan Collins）上个月对美联储降低政策利率投了赞成票，她周三表示，她认为近期进一步宽松的门槛 "相对较高"，理由是担心通胀升高。【原文：Boston Federal Reserve President Susan Collins, who voted for the Fed's policy-rate reduction last month, said on Wednesday she sees a "relatively high bar" for additional easing in the near term, citing worries about elevated inflation.】

item.title: 雪佛龙公司表示，预计圭亚那目前估计的石油资源量还有上升空间
item.description: 雪佛龙公司（Chevron）周三表示，该公司预计圭亚那一个富饶油田的可采资源可能超过目前估计的 110 亿桶石油当量。【原文：Chevron said on Wednesday it expects that a prolific oilfield in Guyana could hold more than the current estimate of 11 billion barrels of oil equivalent in recoverable resources.】

item.title: 大众汽车称 Rivian 合资公司的技术未来可应用于内燃机汽车
item.description: 大众汽车集团（Volkswagen Group）周三表示，该公司与美国电动汽车制造商 Rivian Automotive 合作开发的技术最终可能会用于其内燃机汽车。【原文：Volkswagen Group said on Wednesday the technology it is developing with U.S. electric-vehicle maker Rivian Automotive could eventually be used in its internal combustion engine vehicles.】

item.title: 诺和诺德首席执行官在肥胖症交易中释放出新的风险偏好信号
item.description: 9 月底，当诺和诺德首席执行官迈克-杜斯塔尔（Mike Doustdar）得知美塞拉接受了辉瑞公司 73 亿美元的竞购时，他还不准备放弃这家公司及其肥胖症实验药物组合。【原文：When Novo Nordisk CEO Mike Doustdar learned in late September that Metsera had accepted a $7.3 billion rival bid from Pfizer , he was not ready to give up just yet on the company and its portfolio of experimental obesity drugs.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，美国联邦贸易委员会正在调查代理顾问公司 ISS 和 Glass Lewis
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三援引知情人士的话报道，美国联邦贸易委员会正在调查代理咨询公司 Institutional Shareholder Services 和 Glass Lewis 可能违反反垄断法的行为。【原文：The U.S. Federal Trade Commission is investigating proxy advisory firms Institutional Shareholder Services and Glass Lewis for potential antitrust violations, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 议员称派拉蒙天舞公司 "搪塞 "调查特朗普批准并购案
item.description: 美国众议院两个委员会的最高民主党人周三表示，派拉蒙天舞公司拒绝回答关键问题或提供与特朗普政府批准该公司以 84 亿美元与哥伦比亚广播公司（CBS News）母公司合并有关的文件。【原文：The top Democrats on two U.S. House of Representatives committees said Wednesday Paramount Skydance had refused to answer key questions or provide documents tied to the Trump administration's approval of its the company's $8.4 billion merger with the CBS News-parent company.】

item.title: 哈塞特若未当选美联储主席，将留任白宫工作
item.description: 白宫经济顾问凯文-哈塞特（Kevin Hassett）周三表示，由于他在美国中央银行的工作经验，他将能很快投入美联储主席的工作，但如果唐纳德-特朗普总统选择了另一位候选人，他将留任现职。【原文：White House economic adviser Kevin Hassett said on Wednesday that he would be able to get to work quickly as Federal Reserve chair due to his experience at the U.S. central bank, but would stay in his current job if President Donald Trump chooses another candidate.】

item.title: 美国劳工部敦促优先考虑停摆后的 11 月就业和 CPI 数据
item.description: 经济学家表示，美国劳工部统计机构应在政府重新开张时优先编制11月份的就业和通胀报告，以确保美联储官员在12月份的政策会议上掌握最新信息。【原文：The U.S. Labor Department's statistical agency should prioritize the production of November employment and inflation reports when the government reopens to ensure Federal Reserve officials have up-to-date information at their December policy meeting, economists said.】

item.title: 美国最高法院将于 1 月 21 日审理特朗普解雇美联储丽莎-库克的申请
item.description: 美国最高法院周三宣布，将于 1 月 21 日听取唐纳德-特朗普总统试图罢免美联储理事丽莎-库克一案的辩论。【原文：The U.S. Supreme Court announced on Wednesday that it will hear arguments on January 21 in President Donald Trump's attempt to remove Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook, a move without precedent that challenges the central bank's independence.】

item.title: WeightWatchers 将在 2026 年上市后销售诺和诺德的 Wegovy 药片
item.description: WeightWatchers 的首席执行官周三表示，如果诺和诺德备受期待的 Wegovy 明年在美国上市，该公司计划以药丸的形式销售这种药物，从而加深与这家丹麦肥胖症药物制造商的合作。【原文：WeightWatchers' CEO said on Wednesday it plans to sell Novo Nordisk's much-anticipated Wegovy in pill form if it is launched next year in the United States, deepening its tie-up with the Danish obesity drugmaker.】

item.title: 特朗普承诺向使用关税收入的美国人发放 2000 美元红利--白宫
item.description: 白宫周三表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统承诺利用特朗普关税给政府国库带来的资金，为美国人提供一张 2000 美元的支票。【原文：President Donald Trump is committed to providing Americans a $2,000 check using money that has come into government coffers from Trump's tariffs, the White House said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 白宫称部分经济数据因政府关门而受损
item.description: 白宫周三表示，由于政府关门，10 月份的就业和通胀数据报告可能永远不会公布。【原文：The White House said on Wednesday that October jobs and inflation data reports might never be released as a consequence of the government shutdown.】

item.title: 亚马逊因 "惩罚性 "处理员工缺勤被起诉
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）周三被提起集体诉讼，称该零售商对数千名仓库残疾员工实行 "惩罚性 "缺勤政策。【原文：Amazon.com was sued on Wednesday in a proposed class action saying the retailer subjects thousands of warehouse employees with disabilities to a "punitive" policy governing workplace absences.】

item.title: 葡萄牙电信公司计划在 5 年内投资 49 亿美元用于 5G 和卫星建设
item.description: 葡萄牙基础设施部周三表示，葡萄牙电信运营商计划在未来五年斥资42亿欧元（49亿美元）建设高速5G网络和卫星，以支持数据中心和人工智能等重大项目。【原文：Portuguese telecoms operators plan to spend 4.2 billion euros ($4.9 billion) on high-speed 5G networks and satellites over the next five years to support major projects such as data centres and AI, the Infrastructure Ministry said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，欧盟咨询机构建议将大部分关键频谱提供给移动运营商
item.description: 据直接知情人士周三透露，欧盟委员会的一个咨询机构将建议，将移动运营商和互联网提供商争夺的一个关键频谱的大部分分配给前者。【原文：An advisory body to the European Commission will propose that the bulk of a key spectrum fought over by mobile operators and internet providers should be allocated to the former, people with direct knowledge of the matter said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 智利拉塔姆航空公司因飞行员罢工取消 173 个航班
item.description: 拉美航空（LATAM Airlines）周三表示，该公司飞行员罢工后，至少有 173 个航班被取消，2 万名乘客受到影响。【原文：At least 173 flights have been canceled and 20,000 passengers affected after pilots for LATAM Airlines went on strike, the company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，英国石油公司正积极与斯通彼克公司商谈嘉实多出售事宜
item.description: 两位知情人士透露，英国石油公司正在与投资公司Stonepeak就出售嘉实多润滑油部门进行积极谈判，这将是该能源公司实现200亿美元资产剥离目标的重要一步。【原文：BP is in active talks with investment firm Stonepeak over the sale of its Castrol lubricants unit, two people with knowledge of the situation said, in what would be a major step in meeting the energy company's $20 billion divestment goal.】

item.title: Dayforce 股东支持 Thoma Bravo 123 亿美元的私有化交易
item.description: Dayforce 表示，在其最大股东表示将投票反对 Thoma Bravo 以 123 亿美元收购这家人力资源软件提供商的提议一个月后，该公司获得了绝大多数股东的赞成票。【原文：Dayforce said that it has received an overwhelmingly positive stockholder vote for a proposed $12.3 billion buyout of the HR software provider by Thoma Bravo, a month after its largest shareholder said it would vote against the deal.】

item.title: 爱尔兰媒体监管机构对马斯克的 X 展开调查
item.description: 爱尔兰媒体监管机构周三开始对社交媒体平台 X 进行调查，原因是担心该平台没有给用户对内容审核决定提出上诉的机会，而且其内部投诉处理系统不易访问。【原文：Ireland's media regulator began an investigation into social media platform X on Wednesday over concerns it is not giving users a chance to appeal content moderation decisions and that its internal complaint-handling systems are not easy to access.】

item.title: 美联储博斯蒂克赞成利率不变，通胀风险仍较大
item.description: 亚特兰大联储主席拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）周三表示，他赞成维持利率不变，直到有 "明确证据 "表明通胀率正在回升至美国央行设定的 2% 的目标。【原文：Atlanta Federal Reserve President Raphael Bostic on Wednesday said he favors leaving interest rates where they are until there is "clear evidence" that inflation is moving back to the U.S. central bank's 2% target.】

item.title: 墨西哥州长称英伟达将投资 10 亿美元在墨西哥北部建设人工智能数据中心
item.description: 墨西哥北部新莱昂州州长塞缪尔-加西亚（Samuel Garcia）周三表示，英伟达（Nvidia）将投资 10 亿美元在墨西哥北部新莱昂州建立一个所谓的绿色数据中心，重点发展人工智能。【原文：Nvidia will invest $1 billion to build a so-called green data center focusing on artificial intelligence in the northern Mexican state of Nuevo Leon, Governor Samuel Garcia said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 数据显示，10 月份错过汽车贷款还款的次级贷款者人数创历史新高
item.description: 惠誉评级公司（Fitch Ratings）的数据显示，拖欠汽车贷款至少 60 天的次级借款人比例在 10 月份上升到 6.65%，创下历史最高水平。【原文：The share of subprime borrowers at least 60 days behind on their auto loans rose to 6.65% in October, the highest level on record, according to Fitch Ratings data going back to the early 1990s.】

item.title: 美联储沃勒：简化支付账户将于 2026 年第四季度投入使用
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会（Fed Reserve）理事克里斯托弗-沃勒（Christopher Waller）周三表示，美联储的目标是在明年第四季度之前启用一套新的简化支付账户，以便根据风险情况使用美联储的支付服务。【原文：The U.S. Federal Reserve aims to get a new set of streamlined payment accounts that would allow risk-tailored access to Fed payment services operational by the fourth quarter of next year, Fed Governor Christopher Waller said on Wednesday.】
